text: annane avar yusuphinre atutt katannucennu. avar parannu: "prabhea, nannaleyum nannalute kutumbatteyum varuti badhiccirikkunnu. tanataram carakkumayan nannal vannirikkunnat. atinal ann nannalkk alav purttikariccutaranam. nannalkk danamayum nalkanam. dharmistharkk allahu arhamaya pratiphalam nalkum; tircca.”
